TextLibrary.Text: Travel to Cepheus Station to get a Laser Netgen.
500 Credits subtracted. You have the Laser Netgen. Now travel to the Perseus Station for the EMP Module.
You must have 500 Credits to purchase the Laser Netgen.
Travel to Perseus Station to get an EMP Module.
500 Credits subtracted. You now have the EMP Module.
You must have 500 Credits to purchase the EMP Module.
Wait for your enemy at the Regulus-Lyra LeapGate.
No sign of an enemy yet...
Wait for your enemy at the Regulus-Lyra LeapGate.
No sign of an enemy yet...
Wait for your enemy at the Regulus-Lyra LeapGate.
Battle the enemy you have snared at the Regulus-Lyra LeapGate.
